sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_snc_servicenow_s_servicenow_scripting"> <x_snc_servicenow_s_servicenow_scripting action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <code_url/> <code_url_2/> <details/> <example_steps/> <example_url/> <module/> <number>SNSCRIPT0001076</number> <replaced_by/> <script>Here is your new account and temporary password. If you have any questions, please contact your Service Desk at (303) 555-1212.  Your AD logon: ${u_new_user.u_ad_logon}  Your Temporary Password: ${u_new_user.u_temp_password}  Thank you, TW Telecom Service Desk </script> <script_2/> <script_type>Workflow</script_type> <short_description>Notification Message for New Employee OnBoarding</short_description> <state>Submitted</state> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2016-08-28 18:43:07</sys_created_on> <sys_id>05a52fcd13e56240e5adbd522244b0bd</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2016-08-28 18:43:07</sys_updated_on> <tested_on_helsinki/> </x_snc_servicenow_s_servicenow_scripting> </record_update>
